The Complainant-Petitioner - On: The Complainant-Petitioner has filed this revision application seeking to revise the

WRITTEN SUBMISSIONS: judgment of the Learned High Court Judge of Kandy dated 25.Q2.2016  in case No.

The Complainant-Petitioner - On: HC  255/2014.  As  per  the  journal  entry  on  21.06.2018,  argument  was  fixed  for

oral  submissions of both parties were made on 08.10.2018.  On  14.12.2018,  it was
again mentioned that the argument was fixed for  09.01.2019. Therefore the journal
